languages.text: "Дождаться, пока неизвестная угроза окажется пред тобой. И встретиться с ней. Мы не знаем, где и когда это будет, и с чем нам предстоит столкнуться. Но мы знаем, что хотим быть там с тобой".
"Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."
languages.original_text: "Дождаться, пока неизвестная угроза окажется пред тобой. И встретиться с ней. Мы не знаем, где и когда это будет, и с чем нам предстоит столкнуться. Но мы знаем, что хотим быть там с тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."
"Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."
"Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."
"Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."
"Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

languages.text: 「未知の脅威が眼前に現れるまで待ってほしい。そして向き合うのだ。それがいつどこで起こるのか、我々には分からない。我々が何に直面するのかも分からない。しかし我々はその時にあなたと共にありたい」
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: 「未知の脅威が眼前に現れるまで待ってほしい。そして向き合うのだ。それがいつどこで起こるのか、我々には分からない。我々が何に直面するのかも分からない。しかし我々はその時にあなたと共にありたい」

languages.text: “我们会等待，等待未知威胁出现在你面前，之后面对它。我们不知道灾难会何时何地降临，也不知道我们将会面对什么，但我们知道，我们想与你并肩作战。”
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: “我们会等待，等待未知威胁出现在你面前，之后面对它。我们不知道灾难会何时何地降临，也不知道我们将会面对什么，但我们知道，我们想与你并肩作战。”

languages.text: "Wartet, bis die unbekannte Gefahr vor Euch erscheint. Und stellt Euch Ihr dann. Wir wissen nicht, wo oder wann es geschehen wird. Wir wissen nicht, was uns erwartet. Doch wir wissen, wir wollen mit Euch zusammen dort sein."
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: "Wartet, bis die unbekannte Gefahr vor Euch erscheint. Und stellt Euch Ihr dann. Wir wissen nicht, wo oder wann es geschehen wird. Wir wissen nicht, was uns erwartet. Doch wir wissen, wir wollen mit Euch zusammen dort sein."

languages.text: « Attendre que la menace se présente à vous, puis l'affronter. Nous ne savons ni où ni quand cela se produira. Nous ne savons pas à quoi nous devrons faire face. Ce que nous savons, cependant, c'est que nous voulons être là, à vos côtés. »
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: « Attendre que la menace se présente à vous, puis l'affronter. Nous ne savons ni où ni quand cela se produira. Nous ne savons pas à quoi nous devrons faire face. Ce que nous savons, cependant, c'est que nous voulons être là, à vos côtés. »

languages.text: «Esperar hasta que esa amenaza desconocida se manifieste. Y entonces la afrontaremos. Desconocemos dónde o cuándo sucederá. Ignoramos a qué habremos de enfrentarnos. Pero sí sabemos que queremos estar ahí con usted».
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: «Esperar hasta que esa amenaza desconocida se manifieste. Y entonces la afrontaremos. Desconocemos dónde o cuándo sucederá. Ignoramos a qué habremos de enfrentarnos. Pero sí sabemos que queremos estar ahí con usted».

languages.text: "Bilinmeyen tehdit karşınıza çıkana dek bekleyin, sonra da onunla yüzleşin. Nerede ya da ne zaman gerçekleşeceğini bilmiyoruz. Ne ile yüzleşeceğimizi de öyle. Ancak bildiğimiz bir şey var: O esnada yanınızda olmak istiyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Wait until the unknown threat appears before you. Then face it. We do not know where or when it will happen. We do not know what we will face. But we know that we want to be there with you."

traits.locale_text: "Bilinmeyen tehdit karşınıza çıkana dek bekleyin, sonra da onunla yüzleşin. Nerede ya da ne zaman gerçekleşeceğini bilmiyoruz. Ne ile yüzleşeceğimizi de öyle. Ancak bildiğimiz bir şey var: O esnada yanınızda olmak istiyoruz."
